(Sorry, I just had to deal with over 150 e-mails, and I'm not happy about 
that, so these next posts over the week are going to suck)

Chordate/Smokescreen/Ramhorn:



Chordate activated his comm. in reply to Firearm's question.  "Take the 
intruder to the brig."

---

Smokescreen sat at the bridge, keeping internal base defenses around the 
prisoners online, but they weren't firing.

===

Ramhorn hopped into a CR chamber inside the Ark.
